name: Domain Machinery
desc: Making extensive use of Domain-grade machinery, disabled or destroyed components are difficult to replace but it can largely take care of itself and will always be recoverable after combat. Safety Overrides and similar modifications are incompatible.

name: Integrated Nanoforge
desc: Making use of highly experimental technology, a corrupted nanoforge has been integrated into this ships systems. Ammo/charge generation for ballistic and missile weapons is increased by %s.
short: Weapons with regenerating ammunition recover ammo significantly quicker.

name: Integrated Pristine Nanoforge
desc: Making use of highly experimental technology, a pristine nanoforge has been integrated into this ships systems. Ammo/charge generation for ballistic and missile weapons is increased by %s and every %s seconds %s of ammo will be replenished for those that donâ€™t replenish themselves naturally.
short: Weapons with regenerating ammunition recover ammo significantly quicker, those without can have ammo manufactured to replenish them.

name: Time Accelerator
desc: Using salvaged systems from high tech unknown entities, supplemental ship systems increase timeflow during combat situations by %s.
